channel.title: [R2]MonkFishies (Monk-fisher)
channel.description:
[center][b]Original post at: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=64319[/b][/center]
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]Fishes and banks monkfish at the Piscatoris Fishing Colony [*]WebWalking between runs [*]Solid breaking system (by Echo_) [*]Multi-player support [*]On-screen progress report [*]SRL Stats [*]Fail-safes to ensure endurance![/ul]
[B][U]Anti-bans:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]HumanMouse [*]Camera rotating[/ul]
[B][U]Requirements:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]Swan Song quest [*]62+ Fishing [*]Small fishing net (Can be bought from banker) [*][U]You MUST have the absolute newest Reflection 2[/U], get it [URL=https://github.com/Drags111/Reflection_Dev/archives/master]here[/URL].[/ul]
I noticed no one made a monk-fisher so I thought it'd be a nice one to have, even if it's rarely used. Very simple script, took me around an hour or so because I had trouble with NPC banking. (This is also my first script that deals with NPCS:))
Because the size of the script exceeds the max characters limitations, I can only post a link to the original post, there you can download and use the script. View the original post here: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=64319
Suggestions/Progress reports are more than welcome!

item.title: [R2]MonkFishies (Monk-fisher)
item.dc:creator: @Wolf Wolf
item.description:
@Wolf wrote:

[center]Original post at: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=64319[/center]

Features:

[ul][]Fishes and banks monkfish at the Piscatoris Fishing Colony
[]WebWalking between runs
[]Solid breaking system (by Echo_)
[]Multi-player support
[]On-screen progress report
[]SRL Stats
[*]Fail-safes to ensure endurance![/ul]

Anti-bans:

[ul][]HumanMouse
[]Camera rotating[/ul]

Requirements:

[ul][]Swan Song quest
[]62+ Fishing
[]Small fishing net (Can be bought from banker)
[]You MUST have the absolute newest Reflection 2, get it here.[/ul]

I noticed no one made a monk-fisher so I thought it’d be a nice one to have, even if it’s rarely used. Very simple script, took me around an hour or so because I had trouble with NPC banking. (This is also my first script that deals with NPCS:))

Because the size of the script exceeds the max characters limitations, I can only post a link to the original post, there you can download and use the script. View the original post here: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=64319

Suggestions/Progress reports are more than welcome!
